segments.text: I see the woman focused on her dish-drying, oblivious to it all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet runs unchecked, causing the sink to overflow dramatically.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water sheets down the front, pooling on the floor in a big puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing right in it, but her face shows no sign of awareness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To her left, the boy is on a stool that's visibly unsteady.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching high for the cookie jar, one hand inside grabbing treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl below him has her arm up, palm out, eagerly waiting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's amazing how coordinated their little cookie heist is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinets frame them like a picture of mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that tilting stool has me holding my breath for a fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden view through the window is so serene in comparison.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I never expected such hazards in this everyday kitchen setup.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stacked dishes by the sink add to the sense of routine turning chaotic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a surprising blend of calm and impending trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR
